ygData.subject: Familiars&I dont know why you play a wizard but...
ygData.messageBody:
Qenelin wrote
<It's obvious that most people here DO have problems.....>

I have to agree whole heartedly with this statment. Most people here do have problems :)

As to familiars I for one do not want anything like this to go through. I play both a magician lvl 16 and a wizard lvl 19 on rodcet nife server.I dont think the wizard should ever have any type of pet. I started playing a wiz because i hated nedding to stop and summon my pet ever load and having to worry that my pet would not follow me exactly and train me. Pets are a big hassle that it dont want to deal with as a wizard.

Of course this is just my opinion i could be wrong.
